meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or containing iodine.
meanings.sent1: The iodic solution was used to disinfect the wound.
meanings.sent2: Her skin had an iodic smell after swimming in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The iodic taste of the seaweed made her cringe.
meanings.sent4: The iodic color of the sky at sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The iodic properties of the mineral were fascinating to the scientists.

meanings.sent1: The iodic crystals sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her iodic necklace matched the blue of the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The iodic pattern on the fabric looked like tiny waves.
meanings.sent4: His iodic eyes seemed to change color in different light.
meanings.sent5: The iodic glow of the fireflies lit up the night.

meanings.definition: Formed by the action of iodine.
meanings.sent1: The iodic compound was created in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The iodic reaction turned the solution purple.
meanings.sent3: The iodic experiment resulted in a surprising color change.
meanings.sent4: The iodic film on the glass was difficult to remove.
meanings.sent5: The iodic stain on the fabric was stubborn and wouldn't come out.
